name: Nordic Financial Unions
membership:
Finance Watch: www.finance-watch.org
UNI Europa Finance: www.uniglobalunion.org
goal: Nordic Financial Unions (NFU) is an organisation for co-operation between trade unions that organises employees in the banking, finance and insurance sectors in the five Nordic countries. At present, seven trade unions are affiliated to the NFU; two in Denmark, one in Finland, two in Sweden, and one in Iceland and Norway, respectively. Through these trade unions, NFU represents 150 000 employees in the Nordic financial markets.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market
euInitiatives: Capital Markets Union, retail financial services, IMD 2,Mifid 2, Long-term financing and level 2 activities by the European Supervisory Authorities.
